ModMetaData.name: Symbiophore and Silk
ModMetaData.author: CEM
ModMetaData.description: Introducing the Symbiophore, an extraordinary creature from the dense jungles, distinguished by its rare psychic abilities. Symbiophores are not only excellent companions but they also harmonize with the psychic energy of your colonists, uplifting their mood and well-being. These creatures also serve as unique psychic entropy sponges, relieving your psycasters of excess psychic strain. Their need for human interaction makes them ideal pets, requiring constant social engagement to survive. Can your colony embrace this intriguing symbiotic relationship?
